snippet: Attendees at C.E.S. will find some low-tech products alongside the smartphones.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes the Energizer Holdings Schick brand is introducing its battery-operated Hydro 5 Power Select razor at the International Consumer Electronics Show; highlights other products at the show.
lead_paragraph: Attendees at C.E.S. will find some low-tech products alongside the smartphones.

headline.seo: At Electronics Show, Some Surprising Nonelectronic Entrants - Advertising
headline.main: Need a Mattress to Go With That TV? You’re in the Right Place
headline.print_headline: Need a Mattress to Go With That TV? You’re in the Right Place
